nodes.text: Kasta drums were a type of drum. One kasta drum was present in the castle of the pirate Maz Kanata on the planet Takodana around thirty years after the Battle of Endor.

A kasta drum first appeared as a prop in Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens, a film released in 2015. It was not identified in the film, but was named in the reference book Star Wars: The Force Awakens: The Visual Dictionary, written by Pablo Hidalgo and released the day after the film.
